title: Texas judge to issue ruling on ACLU's request for temporary restraining order on child abuse investigations of trans children and their parents - CNN
content:
1. Texas judge to issue ruling on ACLU's request for temporary restraining order on child abuse investigations of trans children and their parents  CNN
  2. Lawsuit Alleges Texas Has 'Initiated Investigations' Into Parents Of Transgender Kids  NBC News
  3. Travis Co. District judge temporary blocks Abbott's transgender directive involving Texas family  KXAN.com
  4. Dozens gather to protest Gov. Abbott's arrival in Corpus Christi  KIIITV.com
  5. Judge considers blocking Texas policy of investigating medical care for trans children as ‘child abuse’  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Travis County, Texas, District Court Judge Amy Clark Meachum has granted a temporary restraining order to prevent the state from performing child abuse investigations of families seeking gender-affirming health care for their transgender children.
